text.value: Grid with a maximum of 2 columns. (type=select_one a_b, appearance=compact-2)
Table with image labels (made using an easier method)
No need to do anything special here
A highly specific widget to measure distress
Select multiple widget displaying horizontally (in Enketo)
Show only the inputs of these options and not the labels (type=select_one yes_no, appearance=list-nolabel)
This will launch the video recorder. Not supported in enketo at the moment (type=video)
Prompts for confirmation. Useful to combine with required or relevant. (type=trigger)
Select one displaying horizontally but in columns (in Enketo)
Using a list specified in the choices worksheet (type=select_multiple list)
Advance to the next question immediate after selection in ODK Collect. (type=select_one list, appearance=quick)
This will launch the camera. Not supported in enketo at the moment (type=image)
Using a choice filter to update options based on previous answers (choice_filter: country = and city = , appearance = minimal)
This field has a constraint (type=integer, constraint=.<10)
Show only the inputs of these options and not the labels (type=select_one yes_no, appearance=list-nolabel)
Show only the labels of these options and not the inputs (type=select_one yes_no, appearance=label)
Select one displaying compactly and horizontally (in Enketo)
For exact times, will be converted to UTC/GMT (type=dateTime)
Simply specify an appearance style (type=date, appearance=month-year)
You can also add media to choices. Choose your favorite bird.
This will record the gps location. In enketo it also shows a map. (type=geopoint)
Shows all questions on one page in ODK Collect (appearance=field-list)
Can be short or long but always one line (type = text)
Can be multiple lines (type=text, appearance = multiline)
This will record the gps location. In enketo is is the same as the previous. (type=geopoint, appearance=maps)
Showing a pull-down list of options (type=select_one list, appearance=minimal)
A much easier way to do the same (appearance=table-list)
Scans multi-format 1d/2d barcodes. In enketo it allows manual entry (type=barcode)
Using a choice filter to update options based on previous answers (choice_filter: country = and city = )
Shows all questions on one page in ODK Collect (appearance=field-list)
Same as previous but this one advances to the next question automatically in ODK Collect. (type=select_one a_b, appearance=quickcompact)
To show a larger map (on desktop screens), you can hide the input fields. (appearance = hide-input)
Add the file name in the audio column on your survey sheet. Make sure you upload this file when you publish your form.
Using a choice filter to update options based on a previous answer (choice_filter: country = )
Show only the inputs of these options and not the labels (type=select_one yes_no, appearance=list-nolabel)
This will launch the audio recorder. Not supported in enketo at the moment (type=audio)

Widgets Developer form.
Show hidden branches to see if widgets are properly disabled by entering $('.or-branch').show() in console.
See how widgets behave when they are cloned (when a repeat is created).
The XLS Form source is [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0Al3Mw5sknZoPdGxzeHg0QlZHYlhFWElRaHBlVXNUV3c&usp=sharing).
Add the file name in the image column on your choices sheet. Make sure you upload this file when you publish your form.
Simply specify and appearance style (type=date, appearance=year)
Make sure to put a.jpg and b.jpg in the form-media folder to see images here. (type=select_one a_b, appearance=compact)
This is a note and it uses a value of another field in its label (type=note)
This field has a constraint (type=date, constraint=.>= today())
Show only the inputs of these options and not the labels (type=select_one yes_no, appearance=list-nolabel)
Showing a pull-down list of options (type=select_multiple list, appearance=minimal)
This will record a closed sequence/polygon of geopoints (type=geoshape, appearance=maps hide-input)
No need to do anything special here
This will record a sequence/line of geopoints (type=geotrace, appearance=maps hide-input)
You can add a sound recording, an image and a video to any input label or to a note.
This field has a constraint (type=decimal, constraint=. > 10.51 and . < 18.39)
A much easier way to do the same (appearance=table-list) but it may slow down your form a bit.
enter something to hide everything (disable branch)
Scroll down to see default selection (type=select_one list2, default=8)
Date widget (this one allows only future dates and has a default value)
Select one displaying horizontally but in columns (in Enketo)

Note widget. In notes you can emphasize _words_ or _multiple words_ or __strongly emphasize something__. You can also use a line break to start a new sentence.
The decimal number you entered was .
Multiline Text widget in enketo (in ODK collect this a normal text field)
Using a choice filter to update options based on a previous answer (choice_filter: country = , appearance: minimal)
Show only the labels of these options and not the inputs (type=select_one yes_no, appearance=label)
Select multiple widget (don't pick c and d together)
Geopoint widget that hides input fields by default
